alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 6:48PM EDT until July 09 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Central Lexington County in central South Carolina... Central Richland County in central South Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 648 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Irmo, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, Dentsville, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Arcadia Lakes, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market and Woodfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 54 and 76. Interstate 26 between mile markers 94 and 120. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 19. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Murray move away from the water and take shelter!
